content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * simple striped bag with twisted cords for drawstring closure **skill level** easy **materials** berroco zen colors 50 grs 3 hanks/330 yards #8141 mt fuji mix a berroco zen 50 grs 2 hanks/220 yards each #8222 kimchi b and #8242 kawakubo blue c 2 ceramic beads from one world buttons 1 each #pra 3413-42lp and #pra 3413 42pl two 9 diameter circles of stiff felt for bottom of bag **gauge** no gauge information provided in pattern
